name: Gold ball
description:
Let's carry the flying gold ball to the goal!

The appeal of this game is the simplicity of carrying it to the goal without hitting an obstacle on the stage with a gold ball. There is only one operation to bring the gold ball to the goal. Just tap the screen. You can clear it in 1 minute per stage, so you can feel free to play.

Install the game and bring the gold ball to the goal for a wonderful sight!

The fate of the gold ball is in your hands

Along with the gold ball
